Customer Service

Overall cleanliness of your facility is extremely important. This also includes the appearance of your floors and carpets. Constant foot traffic, spills and ageing will eventually have a negative impact on the appearance of your facility. Executive Cleaning Solutions will evaluate your flooring and carpet needs and recommend a program that will work best for your facility. We want to be part of your company’s professional appearance. Whether it’s a one-time carpet clean or an annual floor maintenance plan, Executive Cleaning Solutions is your carpet and flooring specialist.
We offer the following services.
New flooring
New carpet
Carpet cleaning
Stripping and Waxing
Floor Cleaning Programs
Scrub and Recoat Services
Commercial Floor Cleaning
Floor Maintenance Programs
